Plot: A middle-aged playboy becomes fascinated by the daughter of a private detective who has been hired to entrap him with the wife of a client.
Title: Love in the Afternoon
Writer: Billy Wilder (screenplay), I.A.L. Diamond (screenplay), Claude Anet (novel)
Actors: Gary Cooper, Audrey Hepburn, Maurice Chevalier, John McGiver
Awards: Nominated for 3 Golden Globes. Another 3 wins & 1 nomination.
